TextView.android:text: 1. Word Ending-hood The word ending -tood is represented by a disconnected ‘a.’
2. Word Ending -ward The word ending-ward is also represented by a disjoined d. Spell: o-n-ward, onward
3. Ul Ul is represented by oo when it comes before a forward or upward stroke.
4. Quantities and Amounts Here are a few more helpful abbreviations for quantities and amounts.
• Note that the ‘n’ for hundred is written beneath the figure as a distinct marker, whereas for million, the ‘m’ is written beside the figure.
